## System Architecture Overview This document provides a comprehensive activity diagram showing how all agents interact within the VividWalls Multi-Agent System (MAS). ## Main System Activity Diagram ```mermaid graph TB %% Start and End points Start([System Start]) End([System End]) %% External Triggers UserRequest[/User Request/] ScheduledTask[/Scheduled Task/] WebhookTrigger[/Webhook Event/] %% Business Manager - Central Orchestrator BMDecision{Business Manager
Decision Engine} BMAnalyze[Analyze Request Type] BMAllocate[Allocate Resources] BMMonitor[Monitor Performance] %% Director Level Agents MarketingDir{Marketing Director} SocialDir{Social Media Director} AnalyticsDir{Analytics Director} %% Execution Agents EmailMarketing[Email Marketing Agent] ShopifyAgent[Shopify Agent] CustomerService[Customer Service Agent] OrdersFulfillment[Orders Fulfillment Agent] %% Content Creation Agents CopyWriter[Copy Writer Agent] CopyEditor[Copy Editor Agent] KeywordAgent[Keyword Agent] %% Social Media Agents FacebookAgent[Facebook Agent] InstagramAgent[Instagram Agent] PinterestAgent[Pinterest Agent] %% MCP Tools Layer subgraph MCP Tools ShopifyMCP[Shopify MCP] FacebookMCP[Facebook Ads MCP] EmailMCP[Email Marketing MCP] SEOMCP[SEO Research MCP] SupabaseMCP[Supabase MCP] Neo4jMCP[Neo4j MCP] ColorMCP[Color Psychology MCP] end %% Data Stores subgraph Data Layer BusinessKB[(Business Knowledge Base)] SharedKB[(Shared Agency Knowledge)] CustomerDB[(Customer Database)] ProductDB[(Product Database)] end %% Main Flow Start --> UserRequest Start --> ScheduledTask Start --> WebhookTrigger UserRequest --> BMAnalyze ScheduledTask --> BMAnalyze WebhookTrigger --> BMAnalyze BMAnalyze --> BMDecision %% Business Manager Decision Branches BMDecision -->|Marketing Task| MarketingDir BMDecision -->|Sales/Support Task| ShopifyAgent BMDecision -->|Order Processing| OrdersFulfillment BMDecision -->|Customer Issue| CustomerService BMDecision -->|Analytics Request| AnalyticsDir %% Marketing Director Flow MarketingDir -->|Email Campaign| EmailMarketing MarketingDir -->|Social Media| SocialDir MarketingDir -->|Content Need| CopyWriter MarketingDir -->|SEO Research| KeywordAgent %% Social Media Director Flow SocialDir -->|Facebook Campaign| FacebookAgent SocialDir -->|Instagram Content| InstagramAgent SocialDir -->|Pinterest Strategy| PinterestAgent %% Content Creation Flow CopyWriter --> CopyEditor CopyEditor -->|Approved| MarketingDir %% MCP Tool Usage EmailMarketing --> EmailMCP EmailMarketing --> ShopifyMCP ShopifyAgent --> ShopifyMCP ShopifyAgent --> SupabaseMCP FacebookAgent --> FacebookMCP InstagramAgent --> FacebookMCP PinterestAgent --> ShopifyMCP KeywordAgent --> SEOMCP %% Data Access BMDecision --> BusinessKB MarketingDir --> SharedKB ShopifyAgent --> CustomerDB ShopifyAgent --> ProductDB %% Performance Monitoring BMDecision --> BMMonitor BMMonitor -->|Performance Data| AnalyticsDir AnalyticsDir -->|Reports| BMDecision %% Completion Flows EmailMarketing -->|Complete| BMMonitor ShopifyAgent -->|Complete| BMMonitor OrdersFulfillment -->|Complete| BMMonitor CustomerService -->|Complete| BMMonitor BMMonitor -->|All Tasks Complete| End ```

## Inter-Agent Communication Flow

```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant BM as Business Manager
    participant MD as Marketing Director
    participant EM as Email Marketing
    participant SM as Social Media Director
    participant FA as Facebook Agent
    participant MCP as MCP Servers
    participant KB as Knowledge Base
    
    User->>BM: Marketing Campaign Request
    BM->>KB: Check Historical Performance
    KB-->>BM: Past Campaign Data
    
    BM->>MD: Create Campaign Strategy
    Note over BM,MD: Includes budget, timeline, objectives
    
    MD->>EM: Email Campaign Component
    MD->>SM: Social Media Component
    
    par Email Execution
        EM->>MCP: Get Customer Segments
        MCP-->>EM: Segment Data
        EM->>MCP: Create Campaign
        MCP-->>EM: Campaign Created
    and Social Execution
        SM->>FA: Facebook Campaign
        FA->>MCP: Create Ad Sets
        MCP-->>FA: Ad Sets Created
    end
    
    EM-->>MD: Email Complete
    FA-->>SM: Facebook Complete
    SM-->>MD: Social Complete
    
    MD-->>BM: Campaign Launched
    BM->>KB: Store Campaign Data
    BM-->>User: Campaign Status Update
```

## Decision Flow Pattern ```mermaid graph TD %% Decision Framework Request[Incoming Request] Analyze{Analyze Request Type} %% Request Types Marketing{Marketing
Request?} Sales{Sales
Request?} Support{Support
Request?} Analytics{Analytics
Request?} %% Priority Assessment Priority{Assess Priority} High[High Priority] Medium[Medium Priority] Low[Low Priority] %% Resource Check Resources{Resources
Available?} Allocate[Allocate Resources] Queue[Queue Request] %% Execution Execute[Execute Task] Monitor[Monitor Progress] Complete[Task Complete] %% Flow Request --> Analyze Analyze --> Marketing Analyze --> Sales Analyze --> Support Analyze --> Analytics Marketing --> Priority Sales --> Priority Support --> Priority Analytics --> Priority Priority --> High Priority --> Medium Priority --> Low High --> Resources Medium --> Resources Low --> Queue Resources -->|Yes| Allocate Resources -->|No| Queue Allocate --> Execute Execute --> Monitor Monitor --> Complete Queue -->|Resources Free| Allocate ```

## Parallel Processing Pattern ```mermaid graph LR %% Parallel Execution Start[Campaign Start] subgraph Parallel Tasks Email[Email Campaign] Facebook[Facebook Ads] Instagram[Instagram Posts] Pinterest[Pinterest Pins] SEO[SEO Optimization] end Sync{Synchronization
Point} Report[Consolidated Report] Complete[Campaign Complete] %% Flow Start --> Email Start --> Facebook Start --> Instagram Start --> Pinterest Start --> SEO Email --> Sync Facebook --> Sync Instagram --> Sync Pinterest --> Sync SEO --> Sync Sync --> Report Report --> Complete ```

## Error Handling Pattern ```mermaid graph TD %% Error Handling Task[Task Execution] Error{Error
Detected?} %% Error Types Retry{Retryable?} RetryCount{Retry Count
<3?} %% Actions RetryTask[Retry Task] LogError[Log Error] Escalate[Escalate to BM] Notify[Notify Human] Fallback[Execute Fallback] %% Recovery Recovery[Recovery Process] Resume[Resume Normal Flow] %% Flow Task --> Error Error -->|No| Resume Error -->|Yes| LogError LogError --> Retry Retry -->|Yes| RetryCount Retry -->|No| Escalate RetryCount -->|Yes| RetryTask RetryCount -->|No| Escalate RetryTask --> Task Escalate --> Fallback Escalate --> Notify Fallback --> Recovery Recovery --> Resume ```

## Key Integration Points

### 1. Business Manager Hub
- Central decision-making and orchestration
- Resource allocation and monitoring
- Performance tracking and optimization

### 2. Director-Level Coordination
- Marketing Director: Campaign strategy
- Social Media Director: Platform management
- Analytics Director: Performance insights

### 3. Execution Layer
- Specialized agents for specific tasks
- Direct MCP tool integration
- Autonomous operation within parameters

### 4. MCP Server Layer
- Tool access for all agents
- Standardized API interfaces
- Centralized authentication

### 5. Knowledge Management
- Business-specific knowledge base
- Shared agency knowledge
- Historical performance data

## Performance Monitoring ```mermaid graph TB %% Monitoring Flow Agents[All Agents] Metrics[Performance Metrics] subgraph KPIs Revenue[Revenue Metrics] Engagement[Engagement Rates] Conversion[Conversion Rates] Efficiency[Task Efficiency] end Analytics[Analytics Director] Dashboard[Executive Dashboard] Alerts{Alert
Thresholds?} Notify[Notify Business Manager] Optimize[Optimization Recommendations] %% Flow Agents --> Metrics Metrics --> Revenue Metrics --> Engagement Metrics --> Conversion Metrics --> Efficiency Revenue --> Analytics Engagement --> Analytics Conversion --> Analytics Efficiency --> Analytics Analytics --> Dashboard Analytics --> Alerts Alerts -->|Exceeded| Notify Analytics --> Optimize Notify --> Agents Optimize --> Agents ```

## System States

1. **Idle**: Monitoring for triggers
2. **Processing**: Active task execution
3. **Synchronizing**: Inter-agent coordination
4. **Monitoring**: Performance tracking
5. **Optimizing**: Strategy adjustment
6. **Error Recovery**: Handling failures

## Best Practices

1. **Hierarchical Decision Making**: Business Manager → Directors → Execution Agents
2. **Parallel Processing**: Independent tasks run simultaneously
3. **Error Resilience**: Retry logic and fallback strategies
4. **Performance Monitoring**: Continuous KPI tracking
5. **Knowledge Sharing**: Centralized knowledge bases
6. **Tool Integration**: Standardized MCP interfaces
